Zebra API

1.0.214

Provides classes for interfacing with Zebra printers from an Apple® mobile digital device.

I want to...

  • Add ZSDK_API.a to my development environment project
  • Print over TCP/IP
  • Create and print formats
  • Send files to the printer
  • Query printer status
  • Print graphics
  • Read a magnetic stripe
  • Read a smart card
  • Find more information

Tips for developing with this API...

  1. As a best pracitce, Zebra recommends not making calls to our API from the GUI thread
  2. Only Mobile printers are available with built-in magnetic card readers
  3. Each TcpPrinterConnection object should only be used on a single thread
